verses.verse: And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about in the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H2320>[month,<s%>] on the <S%H259>first<s%> of the month, that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5375>take<s%> up a <S%H7015>lamentation<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to him, 'You <S%H1819>compared<s%> yourself to a <S%H3715>young<s%> <S%H3715>lion<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> Yet you are like the <S%H8577>monster<s%> in the <S%H3220>seas;<s%> And you <S%H1518>burst<s%> <S%H1518>forth<s%> in your <S%H5104>rivers,<s%> And <S%H1804>muddied<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> with your <S%H7272>feet,<s%> And <S%H7511>fouled<s%> their <S%H5104>rivers.<s%>'"

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "Now I will <S%H6566>spread<s%> My <S%H7568>net<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you With a <S%H6951>company<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> And they shall <S%H5927>lift<s%> you up in My <S%H2764>net.<s%>

"And I will <S%H5203>leave<s%> you on the <S%H776>land;<s%> I will <S%H2904>cast<s%> you on the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field.<s%> And I will cause <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> to <S%H7931>dwell<s%> on you, And I will <S%H7646>satisfy<s%> the <S%H9130>beasts<s%> of the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth<s%> with you.
"And I will <S%H5414>lay<s%> your <S%H1320>flesh<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> And <S%H4390>fill<s%> the <S%H1516>valleys<s%> with your <S%H7419>refuse.<s%>

"I will also make the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8248>drink<s%> the <S%H6824>discharge<s%> of your <S%H1818>blood,<s%> As <S%H413>far<s%> as the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> And the <S%H650>ravines<s%> shall be <S%H4390>full<s%> of you.

"And when [I] <S%H3518>extinguish<s%> you, I will <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and <S%H6937>darken<s%> their <S%H3556>stars;<s%> I will <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> with a <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> And the <S%H3394>moon<s%> shall not <S%H215>give<s%> its <S%H216>light.<s%>

<S%H3605>"All<s%> the <S%H3974>shining<s%> <S%H216>lights<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> I will <S%H6937>darken<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you And will <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H2822>darkness<s%> on your <S%H776>land,<s%>" <S%H5002>Declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>

"I will also <S%H3707>trouble<s%> the <S%H3820>hearts<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> when I <S%H935>bring<s%> your <S%H7667>destruction<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> into <S%H776>lands<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have not <S%H3045>known.<s%>

"And I will <S%H8074>make<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>peoples<s%> <S%H8074>appalled<s%> at you, and their <S%H4428>kings<s%> shall be <S%H9623>horribly<s%> <S%H8175>afraid<s%> of you when I <S%H5774>brandish<s%> My <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> them; and they shall <S%H2729>tremble<s%> every <S%H7281>moment,<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> for his own <S%H5315>life,<s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> of your <S%H4658>fall.<s%>"
For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> "The <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> upon you.

"By the <S%H2719>swords<s%> of the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>ones<s%> I will cause your <S%H1995>multitude<s%> to <S%H5307>fall;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them are <S%H6184>tyrants<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> And they shall <S%H7703>devastate<s%> the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H1995>multitude<s%> shall be <S%H8045>destroyed.<s%>

"I will also destroy <S%H6>all<s%> its <S%H3605>cattle<s%> from <S%H929>beside<s%> <S%H5921>many<s%> <S%H7227>waters;<s%> And the <S%H4325>foot<s%> of <S%H7272>man<s%> shall not <S%H120>muddy<s%> them <S%H1804>anymore,<s%> And the <S%H5750>hoofs<s%> of <S%H6541>beasts<s%> shall not <S%H929>muddy<s%> them.

<S%H227>"Then<s%> I will make their <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H8257>settle,<s%> And will cause their <S%H5104>rivers<s%> to <S%H1980>run<s%> like <S%H8081>oil,<s%>" <S%H5002>Declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>

"When I <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation,<s%> And the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H8074>destitute<s%> of that <S%H4393>which<s%> <S%H4393>filled<s%> it, When I <S%H5221>smite<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> those who <S%H3427>live<s%> in it, Then they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H1931>"This<s%> is a <S%H7015>lamentation<s%> and they shall <S%H6969>chant<s%> it. The <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H6969>chant<s%> it. <S%H5921>Over<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H1995>multitude<s%> they shall <S%H6969>chant<s%> it," <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about in the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> on the <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5091>wail<s%> for the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H3381>bring<s%> it <S%H3381>down,<s%> her and the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H117>powerful<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> to the <S%H8482>nether<s%> <S%H776>world,<s%> with those who <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H953>pit;<s%>
<S%H4310>'Whom<s%> do you <S%H5276>surpass<s%> in <S%H5276>beauty<s%>? <S%H3381>Go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> and <S%H7901>make<s%> your <S%H7901>bed<s%> with the <S%H6189>uncircumcised.<s%>'

"They shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of those who are <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword.<s%> She is <S%H5414>given<s%> over to the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> they have <S%H4900>drawn<s%> her and <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H1995>multitudes<s%> <S%H4900>away.<s%>

"The <S%H410>strong<s%> among the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>ones<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> of him [and] his <S%H1368>helpers<s%> from the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H7585>Sheol,<s%> 'They have <S%H3381>gone<s%> <S%H3381>down,<s%> they <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H7901>still,<s%> the <S%H6189>uncircumcised,<s%> <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>'

<S%H804>"Assyria<s%> is <S%H8033>there<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H6951>company;<s%> her <S%H6913>graves<s%> are <S%H5439>round<s%> <S%H5439>about<s%> her. <S%H3605>All<s%> of them are <S%H2491>slain,<s%> <S%H5307>fallen<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%>

<S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H6913>graves<s%> are <S%H5414>set<s%> in the <S%H3411>remotest<s%> <S%H3411>parts<s%> of the <S%H953>pit,<s%> and her <S%H6951>company<s%> is <S%H5439>round<s%> <S%H5439>about<s%> her <S%H6900>grave.<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> of them are <S%H2491>slain,<s%> <S%H5307>fallen<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5414>spread<s%> <S%H2851>terror<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living.<s%>

<S%H5867>"Elam<s%> is <S%H8033>there<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H1995>multitude<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> her <S%H6900>grave;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them <S%H2491>slain,<s%> <S%H5307>fallen<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> to the <S%H8482>lower<s%> <S%H8482>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5414>instilled<s%> their <S%H2851>terror<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living,<s%> and <S%H5375>bore<s%> their <S%H3639>disgrace<s%> with those who <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H953>pit.<s%>

"They have <S%H5414>made<s%> a <S%H4904>bed<s%> for her <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H2491>slain<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H1995>multitude.<s%> Her <S%H6913>graves<s%> are <S%H5439>around<s%> it, they are <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6189>uncircumcised,<s%> <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H3588>(although<s%> their <S%H2851>terror<s%> was <S%H5414>instilled<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%>), and they <S%H5375>bore<s%> their <S%H3639>disgrace<s%> with those who <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H953>pit;<s%> they were <S%H5414>put<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H2491>slain.<s%>

<S%H4902>"Meshech,<s%> <S%H8422>Tubal<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H1995>multitude<s%> are <S%H8033>there;<s%> their <S%H6913>graves<s%> <S%H5439>surround<s%> them. <S%H3605>All<s%> of them were <S%H9135>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H6189>uncircumcised,<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> they <S%H5414>instilled<s%> their <S%H2851>terror<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living.<s%>

<S%H3808>"Nor<s%> do they <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H854>beside<s%> the <S%H5307>fallen<s%> <S%H1368>heroes<s%> of the <S%H6189>uncircumcised,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> with their <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> and whose <S%H2719>swords<s%> were <S%H5414>laid<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> their <S%H7218>heads;<s%> but the <S%H5771>punishment<s%> for their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> <S%H1961>rested<s%> on their <S%H6106>bones,<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> the <S%H2851>terror<s%> of [these] <S%H1368>heroes<s%> [was] once in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living.<s%>
"But in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> you will be <S%H7665>broken<s%> and <S%H7901>lie<s%> with those <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

<S%H8033>"There<s%> also is <S%H9000>Edom,<s%> its <S%H4428>kings,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H5387>princes,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> for [all] their <S%H1369>might<s%> are <S%H5414>laid<s%> with those <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> they will <S%H7901>lie<s%> with the <S%H6189>uncircumcised,<s%> and with those who <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H953>pit.<s%>

<S%H8033>"There<s%> also are the <S%H5257>chiefs<s%> of the <S%H6828>north,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6722>Sidonians,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> in spite of the <S%H2851>terror<s%> resulting from their <S%H1369>might,<s%> in <S%H954>shame<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> with the <S%H2491>slain.<s%> So they <S%H7901>lay<s%> <S%H7901>down<s%> <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> with those <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H5375>bore<s%> their <S%H3639>disgrace<s%> with those who <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H953>pit.<s%>

"These <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> will <S%H7200>see,<s%> and he will be <S%H5162>comforted<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1995>multitude<s%> <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> [even] <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H2428>army,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>

<S%H3588>"Though<s%> I <S%H5414>instilled<s%> a <S%H2851>terror<s%> of him in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living,<s%> yet he will be made to <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H7901>down<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> [the] <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> [along] with those <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> [even] <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1995>multitude,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>
